name: @axiom-public/code-validator
description: Multi-stage validation pipeline for LLM-generated code

scripts.example:solidity: ollama run qwq:latest 'Write a Solidity Strategy contract' > /tmp/qwq_test.txt && node validate.mjs --input /tmp/qwq_test.txt --lang solidity --output /tmp/validated.sol --retry --verbose
scripts.example:js: echo 'function test() { return "hello world"; }' | node validate.mjs --input /dev/stdin --lang javascript --verbose

author: Axiom
